## Return Value

The current content manager.

Call this method to create a new content manager. Set the [doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPPlayableContentManager/dataSource] and [doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPPlayableContentManager/delegate] immediately after creating the content manager.

# shared()

**Type Method**

Returns the current content manager instance.

## Declaration

```swift
class func shared() -> Self
```

## Return Value

The current content manager.

## Discussion

Call this method to create a new content manager. Set the [doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPPlayableContentManager/dataSource] and [doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPPlayableContentManager/delegate] immediately after creating the content manager.
title: shared()
